title: [Bug]: USB Jabra Auto Pick Up and Notification Issue
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

USB Jabra Auto Pick Up and Notification Issue

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

1.12.7 

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. When you get a teams call, USB headsets (JABRA with Mic) will not pick up automatically. I have to for select it from settings. However, if I boot with USB headsets then it's fine.
2. Notifications not making a sound or not showing in Gnome center panel
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. When I get a call, and plug in the USB headsets, the app should switch to USB headsets automatically
2. When I get a message, app is not notifying on the gnome center panel or make a sound
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

Hi thank you very much for supporting this awsome app. I have been using it since 4 years.  For some reason, if I dont boot in with USB headsets (Jabra with mic) teams will not pick up the headsets automically. I have to force select it. Problem no 2: I use worspace on Fedora 41, I do not get notifications on gnome center pannel or sound for that matter.
